channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Little dents
item.description: Deciding to fix a big dent in a car isn’t perplexing. It’s an easy choice. There’s a huge dent, get it fixed. It’s the little dents that are a dilemma...

item.title: Hurricanes Helene And Milton Show How Natural Disasters Connect Us All

item.title: Challenging Economics Will Slow The Deployment Of Robotaxis
item.description: Autonomous vehicles operating costs are higher than the revenue they generate; unfavorable unit economics will slow their deployment

item.title: Despite Online Claims, Ukraine’s Zelensky Didn’t Buy Hitler’s Car
item.description: Those with commonsense might question why Zelensky would spend millions of dollars on the car and bring it to Kyiv

item.title: Facing the future
